channel.title: How would i make a player drop 50k when he dies? STILL NEED HELP!
channel.description: How would i make players drop like 50k extra cash when they die? I don't mean like only 50k of the cash they have on them or all their cash... i mean like when they die they will drop 50k cash no matter what they have in their inventory. Lets say... you have full dh and that's it, when you die you lose full dh and 50k is dropped. How would you do this?

item.title: How would i make a player drop 50k when he dies? STILL NEED HELP!
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

davidi2:

Im a 508 guy. But just look for “Oh dear you died” then wherever the thing is that drops the items just add another one for 995, 50000

Thank you, i’ll try my best with that![br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 17, 2009, 11:26:37 am[/size][hr][quote=“davidi2, post:4, topic:302831”]Im a 508 guy. But just look for “Oh dear you died” then wherever the thing is that drops the items just add another one for 995, 50000[/quote]

There’s nothing really saying what he drops.

Read full topic
